channel.title: Met Éireann Warnings
channel.description: Warnings issued by Met Éireann. This RSS feed displays valid warnings for land areas only. Sea area warnings will be added at a later date. Clicking the links, loads the CAP (Common Alerting Protocol) XML file. Note: Moderate means ‘Status Yellow’, Severe means ‘Status Orange’ and extreme means ‘Status Red’

item.title: Blight Advisory for Ireland
item.description: Blight Advisory in operation: Weather conditions conducive to the spread of potato blight will remain in place across many parts of Ireland through to Wednesday (24/08/2022).
item.author: forecasts@met.ie (Met Éireann)

item.title: Small Craft warning from Loop Head to Erris Head to Malin Head
item.description: Southwesterly winds will reach force 6 at times on Irish coasts from Loop Head to Erris Head to Malin Head.
item.author: forecasts@met.ie (Met Éireann)
